name: CFXMLParserCallBacks
desc: Contains version information and function pointers to callbacks needed when parsing XML.

items.name: init(version: CFIndex, createXMLStructure: CFXMLParserCreateXMLStructureCallBack!, addChild: CFXMLParserAddChildCallBack!, endXMLStructure: CFXMLParserEndXMLStructureCallBack!, resolveExternalEntity: CFXMLParserResolveExternalEntityCallBack!, handleError: CFXMLParserHandleErrorCallBack!)
var addChild: CFXMLParserAddChildCallBack!
items.desc: Called when a child is added.

items.name: var createXMLStructure: CFXMLParserCreateXMLStructureCallBack!
items.desc: Called when an XML structure is created.

items.name: var endXMLStructure: CFXMLParserEndXMLStructureCallBack!
items.desc: Called when an XML structure has ended.

items.name: var handleError: CFXMLParserHandleErrorCallBack!
items.desc: Called when a parse error needs to be handled.

items.name: var resolveExternalEntity: CFXMLParserResolveExternalEntityCallBack!
items.desc: Called when an external entity needs to be resolved.
